casebody.data:
CARILLON
v.
NCDHHS, et al. No. 54A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 16, 2006. Melissa L. Trippe, Mark A. Davis, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Thomas W. Woodward, Susan K. Hackney, Assistant Attorney Generals, Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Solicitor General, for NCDHHS. Forrest W. Campbell, Jr., Greensboro, Charles F. Marshall, III, Raleigh, for Carillon Assistant Living. Susan M. Fradenburg, Allyson Jones Labban, Greensboro, for Ridge Care, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of October 2006 by Petitioner for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Petitioner (Carillon Assistant Living) shall have up to and including the 6th day of November 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of October 2006."
